text: ==Qualification rules== A nation may earn up to 1 boat in each of the 14 Rowing events. Note that though crew members' names are given below, for boats which qualified at the 2007 World Championships the crew racing at the Olympics is not required to include the same crew members as the crew which qualified. ==Summary== {| class="wikitable" width=800 style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" ! rowspan="2" align="left"| Nation !! colspan="8" | Men !! colspan="6" | Women !! rowspan="2"|Crews !! rowspan=2|Rowers |- !
